mgILineStringSegment.h
get_Item
get_Positions
IDirectPosition
ILineStringSegment

END_NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY BEGIN_NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY public __gc __interface ILineStringSegment
 

The GisILineStringSegment class is a LineString curve segment type. The shape of GisILineStringSegment is the set of positions defined by the contained collection, plus linear interpolation between consecutive points. This is a helper type for Geometries in the Geometry package. Note: It does not derive from IGeometry.
